Package it.polimi.ingsw.models.operations

Class GameOperations

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.models.operations.GameOperations
public class GameOperations extends Object
Utility class which contains game operations. Instead of testing operations by reproducing entire matches, this class helps to test the correct behaviours of the operations by exposing static methods.

  • Method Details

    • setAvailableWizards

      public static void setAvailableWizards(GameState state)
      Set the available wizards for the game.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.

    • setAvailableTowers

      public static void setAvailableTowers(GameState state)
      Set the available towers for the match. - 2 players: 1 white / 1 black - 3 players: 1 white / 1 black / 1 grey - 4 players: 2 whites / 2 blacks
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of players is not in 2 <= numPlayers <= 4 range.

    • addPlayer

      public static void addPlayer(GameState state, Player newPlayer)
      Add a player to the game. When a player is added the wizard and the tower chosen are removed from the ones available.
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - the player to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if players with same name, wizard or tower are already present.
      IllegalMoveException - when trying to add too many players.

    • updateAvailableWizards

      private static void updateAvailableWizards(GameState state, Wizard wizard)
      Parameters:
      wizard - the wizard to remove from the ones available.

    • updateAvailableTowers

      private static void updateAvailableTowers(GameState state, Tower tower)
      Parameters:
      tower - the tower to remove from the ones available.

    • preparePlanningQueue

      public static void preparePlanningQueue(GameState state)

    • getPlanningQueue

      private static List<Integer> getPlanningQueue(List<Integer> actionQueue, List<Integer> clockwiseOrder)
      Returns the planning queue. The first player is random if the action queue is not provided, otherwise is the first player in the action queue. The other players are in clockwise order starting from the first one.
      Parameters:
      actionQueue - The action queue, null if it's not available.
      clockwiseOrder - A list of players id in clockwise order.
      Returns:
      the planning queue.

    • prepareActionQueue

      public static void prepareActionQueue(GameState state)

    • getActionQueue

      static List<Integer> getActionQueue(List<Integer> planningQueue, List<Assistant> assistants)

    • preparation

      public static void preparation(GameState state)

    • setupIslands

      private static void setupIslands(GameState state)
      Initialize gameState islands. Islands are empty on startup.

    • setupClouds

      private static void setupClouds(GameState state)
      Initialize gameState clouds. Clouds are empty on startup.

    • setupMotherNature

      private static void setupMotherNature(GameState gameState)
      Place Mother Nature on a random island

    • setupStudentsOnIslands

      private static void setupStudentsOnIslands(GameState gameState)
      Add one student to every island except where there is mother nature and on the opposite island of where is mother nature. NB: mother nature position must be set & islands must be initialized

    • setupBag

      private static void setupBag(GameState gameState)
      Initialize the bag with the remaining students not placed on the islands.

    • setupPlayerEntrances

      private static void setupPlayerEntrances(GameState gameState)
      Fill every player's board entrance with students extracted from the bag

    • setupCharacters

      private static void setupCharacters(GameState gameState)
      Add three different characters to the match

    • giveStudentsToCharacter

      private static void giveStudentsToCharacter(GameState gameState, Character character)

      private static void giveOneCoinToPlayers(GameState gameState)

    • setClockwiseOrder

      private static void setClockwiseOrder(GameState gameState)

    • playCharacter

      public static void playCharacter(GameState state, CharacterType characterType, EffectArgs effectArgs)
      Plays the given character. This method can be called in any moment of the ACTION stage.
      Parameters:
      characterType - the character to be played
      effectArgs - the parameters for applying the character effect
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the character is played in non-expert matches, is not one of the three playable character, if the player doesn't have enough coins or if the current player has already been played another character.

    • mergeIslands

      static Island mergeIslands(Island island1, Island island2, Island island3)
      Merge three islands.
      Parameters:
      island1 - the first island.
      island2 - the second island.
      island3 - the third island.
      Returns:
      the island resulting from the merge.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when islands are not adjacent or the tower type is different.

    • mergeIslands

      static Island mergeIslands(Island island1, Island island2)
      Merge two islands. The resulting island will have the position of the island before the other island, a dimension resulting from the sum of the dimensions, all the students on the two islands and all the towers on the islands.
      Parameters:
      island1 - the first island.
      island2 - the second island.
      Returns:
      one island which is the result of the merge.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - when islands are not adjacent or the tower type is different.

    • areAdjacentIslands

      private static boolean areAdjacentIslands(Island island1, Island island2)
      NB: An island is not considered adjacent to itself.
      Parameters:
      island1 - the first island.
      island2 - the second island.
      Returns:
      true if island1 is before island 2 or vice versa, false otherwise.

    • getIslandsDimensionSum

      private static int getIslandsDimensionSum(List<Island> islands)
      Returns the sum of the islands dimension. NB: This method doesn't check if the islands are adjacent.
      Parameters:
      islands - the list of islands.
      Returns:
      the sum of islands dimension.

    • giveTowersToIsland

      private static void giveTowersToIsland(Island island, Tower tower, int quantity)
      Give towers to the island.
      Parameters:
      island - the island that should receive towers.
      tower - the tower to give to the island.
      quantity - the number of towers to give to the island.

    • giveStudentsToIsland

      private static void giveStudentsToIsland(Island island, Student student, int quantity)
      Give students to the island.
      Parameters:
      island - the island that should receive towers.
      student - the student to give to the island.
      quantity - the number of students to give to the island.

    • getMergeableIslands

      static List<Island> getMergeableIslands(List<Island> islands)
      Parameters:
      islands - the list of islands.
      Returns:
      a list with all the islands that can be merged, an empty list if there are no islands to merge.

    • areMergeableIslands

      private static boolean areMergeableIslands(Island island1, Island island2)
      Parameters:
      island1 - the first island.
      island2 - the second island.
      Returns:
      true if the two islands can be merged together, false otherwise.

    • mergeIslands

      public static void mergeIslands(GameState gameState)
      Merge islands if there are any.

    • moveBlocksOnTheNewIsland

      private static void moveBlocksOnTheNewIsland(GameState gameState, List<Island> mergeableIslands, Island newIsland)

    • haveSameTower

      private static boolean haveSameTower(Island island1, Island island2)
      Parameters:
      island1 - the first island.
      island2 - the second island.
      Returns:
      true if the islands have the same tower, false otherwise.

    • updateProfessorsOwners

      public static void updateProfessorsOwners(GameState state)
      Updates the owners of the professors. A player owns a prof if he has the maximum number of students of the same of color of the prof on the hall. When multiple players have the same number of students of one color, then no one own the professor.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game

    • getPlayersWithMoreStudentsOfColor

      private static List<Player> getPlayersWithMoreStudentsOfColor(List<Player> players, Student student)
      Parameters:
      players - the list of students.
      student - the student color.
      Returns:
      the player with more students of the specified color. If more players have the same number of students then both players are returned.

    • moveMotherNature

      public static void moveMotherNature(GameState state, int steps)
      Move mother nature of the specified steps. Once mother nature has been moved on the new island, it calculates the influence on that island and merges it with other islands if there are any.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      steps - the number of steps mother nature has to perform.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if mother nature isn't moved for at least one step, or when is moved for too many steps.

    • getIndexOfIsland

      private static int getIndexOfIsland(List<Island> islands, Island island)
      Parameters:
      islands - the list of islands.
      island - the to search in the list.
      Returns:
      the index of the island in the list.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if island is not present in the list.

    • getMaxMotherNatureSteps

      private static int getMaxMotherNatureSteps(GameState state)

    • getAdditionalMotherNatureSteps

      private static int getAdditionalMotherNatureSteps(GameState state)

    • updateIslandConqueror

      public static void updateIslandConqueror(GameState state, Island island)
      Calculates the influence on the island and updates the conqueror of the island.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      island - the island where the influence is calculated.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the island doesn't exist in gameState.

    • returnBlockToCharacter

      private static void returnBlockToCharacter(GameState state, Island island)

    • getIslandConqueror

      private static Player getIslandConqueror(GameState state, Island island)
      Get the player who conquered the island. It's important to pass the island because there are cases where island conqueror is calculated not only for the island where is mother nature. In a 4 player match is returned the leader of the team.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      island - the island where the conqueror is calculated.
      Returns:
      the player who conquered the island, null if no one can conquer the island.

    • getInfluenceCalculator

      private static InfluenceCalculator getInfluenceCalculator(GameState gameState)
      Parameters:
      gameState - the state of the game.
      Returns:
      the appropriate influence calculator depending on state of the game.

    • removePreviousConquerorTowersFromIsland

      private static void removePreviousConquerorTowersFromIsland(Island island, Player prevConqueror)
      Remove all the towers from the island and return them to the player who previously conquered the island.
      Parameters:
      island - the conquered island.
      prevConqueror - the previous conqueror of the island.

    • putConquerorTowersOnIsland

      private static void putConquerorTowersOnIsland(Island island, Player conqueror)
      Puts the towers of the conqueror on the island.
      Parameters:
      island - the island where to put the towers on.
      conqueror - the player that conquered the island.

    • isGameOver

      public static boolean isGameOver(GameState state)
      The game is over immediately when: - there are only three islands remaining - one player has placed all his towers The game is over at the of a round when: - there are no more students in the bag - there are no more assistants to play
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the game.
      Returns:
      true when the game is over, false otherwise

    • onePlayerHasPlacedAllTowers

      private static boolean onePlayerHasPlacedAllTowers(GameState state)

    • threeOrLessRemainingIslands

      private static boolean threeOrLessRemainingIslands(GameState state)

    • isBagEmpty

      private static boolean isBagEmpty(GameState state)

    • noMoreAssistantsToPlay

      private static boolean noMoreAssistantsToPlay(GameState state)

    • getWinner

      public static Tower getWinner(GameState state)
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the game.
      Returns:
      the tower of the player(s) who won the match, null on tie.
      Throws:
      GameNotOverException - if the game is not ended yet.

    • getTowersPlacedMoreTimesOnIslands

      private static List<Tower> getTowersPlacedMoreTimesOnIslands(List<Island> islands)
      Parameters:
      islands - the list of islands.
      Returns:
      the tower placed more times on the islands. If more towers are placed the same number of times they are both returned.

    • getTowersWithMoreProfessors

      private static List<Tower> getTowersWithMoreProfessors(GameState state)
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      Returns:
      the tower with more professors. In 2/3 players matches is returned the tower of the player with more professors. In 4 players matches is returned the tower of the team with more professors.

    • getNumberOfProfessorByTower

      private static int getNumberOfProfessorByTower(GameState state, Tower tower)
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.
      tower - the tower for which the number of professors are calculated.
      Returns:
      the professors related to a tower. For 2/3 players matches are just the number of professors of the single players. For 4 players match the number of professors is the sum of the professors owned by the team.

    • disableEffects

      public static void disableEffects(GameState state)
      Disable all the effects that should end at the end of the turn.
      Parameters:
      state - the state of the game.

    • makeCharactersPlayable

      public static void makeCharactersPlayable(GameState state)
      Makes the characters playable

      public static List<Assistant> getPlayableAssistants(GameState state)

      private static List<Assistant> getAlreadyPlayedAssistantsOfThisRound(GameState state)

    • getPlayersWhoHaveAlreadyDoneTheirTurn

      private static List<Player> getPlayersWhoHaveAlreadyDoneTheirTurn(GameState state)
